metadata.name: Sol Siete HAIKU #3 Token 1
metadata.description:
Click here to see the unlockables:  https://app.niftykit.com/access/ba747151-8256-44fd-9032-84d889bf49c5

ArtWork: Eysar Vargas  
Voice Over: Sol Siete  
Animation: Arnold Travieso

In order to enjoy the essential benefits of this NFT you must write to cryptomusica.records@gmail.com

Haiku Collection #3  are shares that are awarded to participating holders 3 unlockables that are augmented web3 and musical experiences created by ¨Crypto Musica Records¨:

Shareholder: of the song with the participation of up to 15% in remixes if the fragment that belongs to your NFT is used.

* Access: to my Discord channel with token where I hold a monthly event.

* Be a member of my union of voters, and sign deciding the destination of the funds to invest in the singer including them in the multi-sig portfolio.

*Lifetime credits: as sponsors in my next albums and video clips.  
 
Archive feature linked to the guild and remix contest.

Each item has a different snippet of my voice from the Haiku song and a unique cover art but with the same animation. The NFT is not disclosed at the time of purchase.

After purchasing it, the NFT will be revealed (it may take a few hours as it is a manual process at the moment)

When the first 4 HAIKU #3 NFTs are sold, we start a HAIKU song remix contest with a prize (where the proceeds from the shares will come from)


About the art in this collection:  
Design: Eysar Vargas  
Poetry, music and lyrics: Sol Siete  
Animation: Arnold the Mischievous

To increase the rarity of this collection, go to the music video:  
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=WaF2fFzHPRw
